p.d: 31 August 1995. For the Guerrette family life turns to tragedy. Mona, the mother, dies aged 42. She leaves a farewell message to her daughter, testament of her life. But how to survive such a loss when only a child? Marie-France Guerrette invites us into the privacy of her grief. Directed by: Marie-France Guerrette (Canada, 2018)
